Plus TV Africa bụ ọwa akụkọ pan-African nke Naijiria nke General News and Entertainment Company nwere ma na-agbasa ozi gafee Afrika site na ikpo okwu StarTimes, na DSTV Channel 408 site na 3 Eprel,na afọ 2020, na ọwa YouTube ya. Ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn ahụ na-agbasa n'ihe karịrị mba 30 na ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri na abụọ na-ekiri ya n'Africa.
